name: Clothes Forever2-Styling Game
description:
Clothes Forever 2 – The highly-acclaimed styling fashion mobile game. This game puts you in the shoes of a complete fashion newbie, as you journey step-by-step on the road to becoming the next fashion icon by creating your very own fashion brand. The game has over 10,000 eye-catching clothes, with over 1000 different styles and sets for you to collect. Feel like you’re really part of the story as you navigate your way through a series of captivating story levels, and build complicated relationships with celebrities and fashionistas. Come and discover a whole new world of fashion secrets!

Game Features:
*1000s of Options: A multitude of different outfits, hairstyles and makeup to choose from. Create your own personal wardrobe as you become a professional stylist.

*Rich Story: A fully interactive experience that allows you to select dialogue with various characters that actually influence the story arc. Choose people’s outfits as you direct the story.

*Spotlight: Do battle in “Runway” and “Coquetterie” and take your rightful place as the queen of the catwalk as you earn prizes and awards for your fashion exploits.

*Workshop: Create outfits from drawings, and upgrade and color your clothes. Personalize your clothes and make them really stand out as you become the most talented designer in the world.

*Wonderland: Create a wonderland with your own distinct theme. Create all kinds of beautiful decorations to build the wonderland from your dreams. Make yours the most colorful and unique one in the fashion industry!
